revised_title: Curing Dog Bites and Madness with Lichen Cinereus Terrestris
tldr: George Dampier shares his experience using Lichen Cinereus Terrestris to treat dog bites and madness. The remedy involves bloodletting, washing, and consuming a mixture of the herb and pepper. Hans Sloane confirms that the herb is not Jews Ear but Lichen Cinereus Terrestris, commonly found in barren places around London and England.
